name: DC Marvel 2K3 Trivia Game | Entertainment | 15 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the last Green Lantern killed by the rogue Hal Jordan?
questions.explanation:
Kilowog.

	Sinestro was no Green Lantern by that point; Sinestro was on a one time deal with the Guardians to stop Jordan.  In a true cowboy fashion, Hal Jordan was on his way to absorb all the power of the battery when he was confronted by his old teacher/friend/ally Kilowog.  Armed with an unbeatable will along with numerous other GL rings, Hal eventually killed Kilowog by blasting him with a high intensity energy beam that dissolved him!

questions.text: In the beginning of "The Kree Skrull War" the Vision was shot down and injured by what?
questions.explanation:
3 cows.

	The Vision was shot down by 3 cows that turned out to be Skrulls.  Injured, he went back to the mansion to get help and the rest was history as Iron Man, Thor , and Cap stepped up the battle lines!

questions.text: In the "DC Marvel" crossover what did Aquaman use to beat Prince Namor?
questions.explanation:
Whale.

	In a battle matched by strength and prowess, Aquaman finally used his ability to communicate with all life in the sea to enlist the aid of a whale.  The whale jumped on Namor and knocked him out.

questions.text: What Batman villain had romantic feelings for Officer Montoya?
questions.explanation:
Two Face.

	Harvey Dent, aka Two Face, had a crush on Montoya and did such things as send roses to her at work!

questions.text: In the current smash hit comic mini series, "Infinity Abyss", The Omega clone, created by Thanos, is a mixture of whom?
options: Gladiator and The Hulk and Thanos
Wolverine and the Hulk and Thanos
questions.explanation:
Galactus and Thanos.

	Thanos wanted to create perfect versions of him and used the DNA of his greatest enemies to achieve the perfect version of him.

questions.text: In the legendary "Crisis on Infinite Earths" when Barry Allen, aka the Flash, escaped his prison, what was the first thing he did?
questions.correct: Grabbed Psycho Pirate, beat him sensless and used him to make the Guardians rebel against the Anti-Monitor.
options: Beat Psycho Pirate and used him to escape back to the future to be with his wife, Iris.
Called the Justice League and told them the location of the Anti-Monitor so they could form a strike force.
Vibrated himself into Hypertime, where he saw the future destroyed if he didn't go back and stop the Anti-Monitor.
questions.explanation:
Grabbed Psycho Pirate, beat him sensless and used him to make the Guardians rebel against the Anti-Monitor.

	The Flash used Psycho Pirate to create a distraction so he (Flash) could destroy the Anti-Monitors universe killing cannon.  R.I.P. to the Flash!

questions.text: What was Jim Gordon's belated wife's first Name?
questions.explanation:
Sarah.

	Sarah was killed by Joker while saving some kids.

questions.text: Who is Loki the Trickster God's father?
questions.correct: Laufey, king of the Frost Giants of Jotunheim
options: Pluto, ruler of Hades and nemesis to Hercules
Odin, king and supreme ruler of Asgard and Thors father
Mephisto,  Demonic ruler of Hell and devil to Silver Surfer
questions.explanation:
Laufey, king of the Frost Giants of Jotunheim.

	Loki is the son of Laufey, king of the frost giants of Jotunheim.  When Odin slew his father in battle he adopted the young Loki as his son.

questions.text: What other hero was with John Stewart (Green Lantern) when John Stewart's ego helped destroy an entire planet?
questions.explanation:
Martian Manhunter.

	John and MM were together trying to save the planet, but John thought he could do it by himself and stranded MM in an energy bubble.  When John got to the enemy, he had a planet killer bomb painted all yellow and John was powerless to stop it!

questions.text: In "DC vs Marvel" what Marvel villain appeared in the Batcave under Wayne manor?
questions.explanation:
Bullseye.

	Batman beat Bullseye with Bullseye's own weapon that he hurled at Batman.  Batman is raw.

questions.text: Why did the Marvel Knights Team first form?
questions.correct: To capture Frank Castle, aka The Punisher
options: To stop the Kingpin and cripple his cartel
To hunt down Bullseye who was under contract by Hydra
Daredevil uncovered a secret plan by A.I.M. to wipe the minds of everyone in New York City.
questions.explanation:
To capture Frank Castle, aka The Punisher.

	When they finally got Castle, he escaped en route to jail!

questions.text: In "The Kingdom", sequel to "Kingdom Come", who was the pre-crisis ghost that Batman recognized?
questions.explanation:
Kathy.

	Batman was stunned when he saw his love from another time, Kathy, in the 'Planet Krypton' chapter of the series.

questions.text: What longtime major super villain in the DC universe was brought back to life in "Spectre" # 21?
questions.explanation:
Sinestro.

	Check out this issue of the "Spectre" for all the great stuff!!!

questions.text: How did Max Mercury gain his powers?
options: He was blessed by the God of Speed, Mercury, after saving Mercurys son from drowning.
He was struck by lightning while working in a hydro electric plant.
He was struck by a meteor from the planet Mercury.
questions.explanation:
From an Indian Shaman.

	Max was a messenger for a fort in the old west when he saw the local Indian tribe, The Blackfoot Clan, getting wiped out and massacred by the US Army.  A Shaman blessed Max with his dying breath to give him super speed so he would stop the massacre.  Max quickly disarmed the army and saved the day in his first heroic act.  His first super hero name was Ahwehota, meaning "He who runs beyond the wind."  Max time jumped out his century and into the future (present time for us!) where he adopted a few other identities over the years.  His most recent name in the super hero trade is "Max Mercury".

questions.text: Which of these DC Marvel crossovers never happened?
questions.explanation:
Steel / Dr. Doom

	Steel vs Dr. Doom never happened.  But what a fight that would be.
